author: civanch
body:
#### PR description:
With new Geant4 11.0.7 new options may be activated for simulation. Mainstream MC should not be affected. 

#### PR validation:
private

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for: NO
title: Add extra options to the simulation step
